00092 struct UniquePtr
00093 {
00094 #ifdef OPENVDB_HAS_CXX11
00095     typedef std::unique_ptr<T>  type;
00096 #else
00097     typedef std::auto_ptr<T>    type;
00098 #endif

00103 template <typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00104 class PointDataLeafNode : public tree::LeafNode<T, Log2Dim> {
00105 
00106 public:
00107     typedef PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>           LeafNodeType;
00108     typedef boost::shared_ptr<PointDataLeafNode>    Ptr;
00109 
00110     typedef T                                       ValueType;
00111     typedef std::pair<ValueType, ValueType>         ValueTypePair;
00112     typedef std::vector<ValueType>                  IndexArray;
00113 
00114     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor                Descriptor;
00115 
00117 
00118     // The following methods had to be copied from the LeafNode class
00119     // to make the derived PointDataLeafNode class compatible with the tree structure.
00120 
00121     typedef tree::LeafNode<T, Log2Dim>    BaseLeaf;
00122     typedef util::NodeMask<Log2Dim> NodeMaskType;
00123 
00124     using BaseLeaf::LOG2DIM;

00128     using BaseLeaf::NUM_VOXELS;
00129     using BaseLeaf::SIZE;
00130     using BaseLeaf::LEVEL;
00131 
00133     PointDataLeafNode()
00134         : BaseLeaf()
00135         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }
00136 
00137     ~PointDataLeafNode() { }
00138 
00140     explicit PointDataLeafNode(const PointDataLeafNode& other)
00141         : BaseLeaf(other)
00142         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet(*other.mAttributeSet)) { }
00143 
00145     explicit

00147         : BaseLeaf(coords, value, active)
00148         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }
00149 
00152     PointDataLeafNode(const PointDataLeafNode& other, const Coord& coords, const T& value = zeroVal<T>(), bool active = false)
00153         : BaseLeaf(coords, value, active)
00154         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet(*other.mAttributeSet)) { }
00155 
00156     // Copy-construct from a PointIndexLeafNode with the same configuration but a different ValueType.
00157     template<typename OtherValueType>
00158     PointDataLeafNode(const tools::PointIndexLeafNode<OtherValueType, Log2Dim>& other)
00159         : BaseLeaf(other)
00160         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }
00161 
00162     // Copy-construct from a LeafNode with the same configuration but a different ValueType.
00163     // Used for topology copies - explicitly sets the value (background) to zeroVal
00164     template <typename ValueType>
00165     PointDataLeafNode(const tree::LeafNode<ValueType, Log2Dim>& other, const T& /*value*/, TopologyCopy)
00166         : BaseLeaf(other, zeroVal<T>(), TopologyCopy())
00167         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }
00168 
00169     // Copy-construct from a LeafNode with the same configuration but a different ValueType.
00170     // Used for topology copies - explicitly sets the on and off value (background) to zeroVal
00171     template <typename ValueType>
00172     PointDataLeafNode(const tree::LeafNode<ValueType, Log2Dim>& other, const T& /*offValue*/, const T& /*onValue*/, TopologyCopy)
00173         : BaseLeaf(other, zeroVal<T>(), zeroVal<T>(), TopologyCopy())
00174         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }
00175 
00176 #ifndef OPENVDB_2_ABI_COMPATIBLE

00179         : BaseLeaf(PartialCreate(), coords, value, active)
00180         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }

00280     bool operator==(const PointDataLeafNode& other) const {
00281         if(BaseLeaf::operator==(other) != true) return false;
00282         return (*this->mAttributeSet == *other.mAttributeSet);
00283     }

00343     // to the point-array offsets.

00346         assert(false && "Cannot modify voxel values in a PointDataTree.");
00347     }

00518 // PointDataLeafNode implementation
00519 
00520 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00521 inline void
00522 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::initializeAttributes(const Descriptor::Ptr& descriptor, const size_t arrayLength)
00523 {
00524     mAttributeSet.reset(new AttributeSet(descriptor, arrayLength));
00525 }
00526 
00527 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00528 inline void
00529 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::clearAttributes(const bool updateValueMask)
00530 {
00531     mAttributeSet.reset(new AttributeSet(mAttributeSet->descriptorPtr(), 0));
00532 
00533     // zero voxel values
00534 
00535     for (Index n = 0; n < LeafNodeType::NUM_VALUES; n++) {
00536         this->setOffsetOnly(n, 0);
00537     }
00538 
00539     // if updateValueMask, also de-activate all voxels
00540 
00541     if (updateValueMask)    this->setValuesOff();
00542 }
00543 
00544 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00545 inline bool
00546 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::hasAttribute(const size_t pos) const
00547 {
00548     return pos < mAttributeSet->size();
00549 }
00550 
00551 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00552 inline bool
00553 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::hasAttribute(const Name& attributeName) const
00554 {
00555     const size_t pos = mAttributeSet->find(attributeName);
00556     return pos != AttributeSet::INVALID_POS;
00557 }
00558 
00559 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00560 inline AttributeArray::Ptr
00561 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::appendAttribute(const AttributeSet::Util::NameAndType& attribute,
00562                      const Descriptor& expected, Descriptor::Ptr& replacement)
00563 {
00564     return mAttributeSet->appendAttribute(attribute, expected, replacement);
00565 }
00566 
00567 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00568 inline void
00569 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::dropAttributes(const std::vector<size_t>& pos,
00570                     const Descriptor& expected, Descriptor::Ptr& replacement)
00571 {
00572     mAttributeSet->dropAttributes(pos, expected, replacement);
00573 }
00574 
00575 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00576 inline void
00577 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::reorderAttributes(const Descriptor::Ptr& replacement)
00578 {
00579     mAttributeSet->reorderAttributes(replacement);
00580 }
00581 
00582 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00583 inline void
00584 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::renameAttributes(const Descriptor& expected, Descriptor::Ptr& replacement)
00585 {
00586     mAttributeSet->renameAttributes(expected, replacement);
00587 }
00588 
00589 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00590 inline void
00591 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::swap(AttributeSet* attributeSet)
00592 {
00593     if (!attributeSet) {
00594         OPENVDB_THROW(ValueError, "Cannot swap with a null attribute set");
00595     }
00596 
00597     if (mAttributeSet->descriptor() != attributeSet->descriptor()) {
00598         OPENVDB_THROW(ValueError, "Attribute set descriptors are not equal.");
00599     }
00600 
00601     mAttributeSet.reset(attributeSet);
00602 }
00603 
00604 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00605 inline void
00606 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::setOffsets(const std::vector<ValueType>& offsets, const bool updateValueMask)
00607 {
00608     if (offsets.size() != LeafNodeType::NUM_VALUES) {
00609         OPENVDB_THROW(ValueError, "Offset vector size doesn't match number of voxels.")
00610     }
00611 
00612     for (size_t index = 0; index < offsets.size(); ++index) {
00613         setOffsetOnly(index, offsets[index]);
00614     }
00615 
00616     if (updateValueMask) this->updateValueMask();
00617 }
00618 
00619 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00620 inline void
00621 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::validateOffsets() const
00622 {
00623     // Ensure all of the offset values are monotonically increasing
00624     for (size_t index = 1; index < BaseLeaf::SIZE; ++index) {
00625         if (this->getValue(index-1) > this->getValue(index)) {
00626             OPENVDB_THROW(ValueError, "Voxel offset values are not monotonically increasing");
00627         }
00628     }
00629 
00630     // Ensure all attribute arrays are of equal length
00631     for (size_t attributeIndex = 1; attributeIndex < mAttributeSet->size(); ++attributeIndex ) {
00632         if (mAttributeSet->getConst(attributeIndex-1)->size() != mAttributeSet->getConst(attributeIndex)->size()) {
00633             OPENVDB_THROW(ValueError, "Attribute arrays have inconsistent length");
00634         }
00635     }
00636 
00637     // Ensure the last voxel's offset value matches the size of each attribute array
00638     if (mAttributeSet->size() > 0 && this->getValue(BaseLeaf::SIZE-1) != mAttributeSet->getConst(0)->size()) {
00639         OPENVDB_THROW(ValueError, "Last voxel offset value does not match attribute array length");
00640     }
00641 }
00642 
00643 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00644 inline AttributeArray&
00645 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::attributeArray(const size_t pos)
00646 {
00647     if (pos >= mAttributeSet->size())             OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Attribute Out Of Range - " << pos);
00648     return *mAttributeSet->get(pos);
00649 }
00650 
00651 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00652 inline const AttributeArray&
00653 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::attributeArray(const size_t pos) const
00654 {
00655     if (pos >= mAttributeSet->size())             OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Attribute Out Of Range - " << pos);
00656     return *mAttributeSet->getConst(pos);
00657 }
00658 
00659 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00660 inline const AttributeArray&
00661 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::constAttributeArray(const size_t pos) const
00662 {
00663     return this->attributeArray(pos);
00664 }
00665 
00666 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00667 inline AttributeArray&
00668 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::attributeArray(const Name& attributeName)
00669 {
00670     const size_t pos = mAttributeSet->find(attributeName);
00671     if (pos == AttributeSet::INVALID_POS)         OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Attribute Not Found - " << attributeName);
00672     return *mAttributeSet->get(pos);
00673 }
00674 
00675 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00676 inline const AttributeArray&
00677 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::attributeArray(const Name& attributeName) const
00678 {
00679     const size_t pos = mAttributeSet->find(attributeName);
00680     if (pos == AttributeSet::INVALID_POS)         OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Attribute Not Found - " << attributeName);
00681     return *mAttributeSet->getConst(pos);
00682 }
00683 
00684 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00685 inline const AttributeArray&
00686 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::constAttributeArray(const Name& attributeName) const
00687 {
00688     return this->attributeArray(attributeName);
00689 }
00690 
00691 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00692 inline GroupHandle
00693 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::groupHandle(const AttributeSet::Descriptor::GroupIndex& index) const
00694 {
00695     const AttributeArray& array = this->attributeArray(index.first);
00696     assert(GroupAttributeArray::isGroup(array));
00697 
00698     const GroupAttributeArray& groupArray = GroupAttributeArray::cast(array);
00699 
00700     return GroupHandle(groupArray, index.second);
00701 }
00702 
00703 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00704 inline GroupHandle
00705 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::groupHandle(const Name& name) const
00706 {
00707     const AttributeSet::Descriptor::GroupIndex index = this->attributeSet().groupIndex(name);
00708     return this->groupHandle(index);
00709 }
00710

00713 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::groupWriteHandle(const AttributeSet::Descriptor::GroupIndex& index)
00714 {
00715     AttributeArray& array = this->attributeArray(index.first);
00716     assert(GroupAttributeArray::isGroup(array));
00717 
00718     GroupAttributeArray& groupArray = GroupAttributeArray::cast(array);
00719 
00720     return GroupWriteHandle(groupArray, index.second);
00721 }

00726 {

00728     return this->groupWriteHandle(index);

00731 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00732 inline IndexIter
00733 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::beginIndexAll() const
00734 {
00735     const ValueType start = 0;
00736     const ValueType end = this->getValue(NUM_VOXELS - 1);
00737     return IndexIter(start, end);
00738 }
00739 
00740 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00741 inline typename PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::IndexOnIter
00742 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::beginIndexOn() const
00743 {
00744     ValueOnCIter iter = this->cbeginValueOn();
00745     return IndexOnIter(iter);
00746 }
00747 
00748 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00749 inline typename PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::IndexOffIter
00750 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::beginIndexOff() const
00751 {
00752     ValueOffCIter iter = this->cbeginValueOff();
00753     return IndexOffIter(iter);
00754 }
00755 
00756 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00757 inline IndexIter
00758 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::beginIndex(const unsigned index) const
00759 {
00760     assert(index < BaseLeaf::SIZE);
00761     const ValueType end = this->getValue(index);
00762     const ValueType start = (index == 0) ? ValueType(0) : this->getValue(index - 1);
00763     return IndexIter(start, end);
00764 }
00765 
00766 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00767 inline IndexIter
00768 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::beginIndex(const Coord& ijk) const
00769 {
00770     return this->beginIndex(LeafNodeType::coordToOffset(ijk));
00771 }
00772 
00773 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00774 inline Index64
00775 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::pointCount() const
00776 {
00777     return iterCount(this->beginIndexAll());
00778 }
00779 
00780 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00781 inline Index64
00782 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::onPointCount() const
00783 {
00784     if (this->isEmpty())        return 0;
00785     else if (this->isDense())   return this->pointCount();
00786     return iterCount(this->beginIndexOn());
00787 }
00788 
00789 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00790 inline Index64
00791 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::offPointCount() const
00792 {
00793     if (this->isEmpty())        return this->pointCount();
00794     else if (this->isDense())   return 0;
00795     return iterCount(this->beginIndexOff());
00796 }
00797 
00798 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00799 inline void
00800 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::updateValueMask()
00801 {
00802     ValueType start = 0, end = 0;
00803     for (Index n = 0; n < LeafNodeType::NUM_VALUES; n++) {
00804         end = this->getValue(n);
00805         this->setValueMask(n, (end - start) > 0);
00806         start = end;
00807     }
00808 }
00809 
00810 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00811 inline void
00812 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::setOffsetOn(Index offset, const ValueType& val)
00813 {
00814     this->buffer().setValue(offset, val);
00815     this->setValueMaskOn(offset);
00816 }
00817 
00818 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00819 inline void
00820 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::setOffsetOnly(Index offset, const ValueType& val)
00821 {
00822     this->buffer().setValue(offset, val);
00823 }

00828 {

00841 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::readBuffers(std::istream& is, bool fromHalf)
00842 {
00843     BaseLeaf::readBuffers(is, fromHalf);
00844 
00845     mAttributeSet->read(is);
00846 }
00847 
00848 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00849 inline void
00850 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::readBuffers(std::istream& is, const CoordBBox& bbox, bool fromHalf)
00851 {
00852     // Read and clip voxel values (no clipping yet).
00853     BaseLeaf::readBuffers(is, bbox, fromHalf);
00854 
00855     mAttributeSet->read(is);
00856 }

00860 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::writeBuffers(std::ostream& os, bool toHalf) const
00861 {
00862     BaseLeaf::writeBuffers(os, toHalf);
00863 
00864     mAttributeSet->write(os);
00865 }

00867 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00868 inline Index64
00869 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::memUsage() const
00870 {
00871     return BaseLeaf::memUsage() + mAttributeSet->memUsage();
00872 }
